channel.title: New Project i might attempt - Rune Sim
channel.description:
[center][size=25pt][b]RuneSim[/b][/size][/center] [center]A Runscape Item/Charater Simulator[/center]
Yeah. This is Proberbly going to be very tough.
[b][i]The Infomation:[/i][/b] Its Kind of like a Runescape Simulater (Like a private server. so fourth). Except, It lets you design your charater's looks (What items it has on, equiped, ect). And contains some custom items. (That you can also create with some code or w/e).
So you can have your Runescape charater look like your faviourte T.V Charater. eg.
Homer Simpson:
Helm: 2 Hair Peice Plate: White T-Shirt Legs: Blue Jeans Shoes: Black boots Wepon: TV Remote. Sheild: N/A
^ Just an example. Proberbly wont happen for a long time ^_^.
So.... Thoughts, Comments, ect?

item.description:
@Global wrote:

Thanks guys. Well. I’m going to try and modify some clients to my liking first then ad some of this stuff.

Read full topic
